name: Grooving in spaceships with no gravity and bad guys!
name_original: Grooving in spaceships with no gravity and bad guys!
description:
Here's my 7DRL game! This is my first 7DRL and it was a great time! 

Intro:

My project is a rhythm roguelike where you dance in space with the goal of surviving as long as possible! Move around to the beat and shoot enemies every 4 beats. Strategically line up your movement and dodge lasers and aliens alike.

Controls:

W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys to move

PS. there is a public leaderboard but make sure your username is appropriate or it will be removed!
